"Everybody knew what was at stake," Allen Iverson said. It's easy for players to say it's just another game. But everybody knows it wasn't just another game. It was a game that both teams felt they had to have. The win moved Denver( 48-31) a full game ahead of the Warriors in the race for eighth place in the West with only three games remaining. Wedbush Morgan analyst Lou Kerner says, Facebook is the most ominous threat to Google Inc. , but Facebook is just emblematic of the rising pace at which all of these( startups) are moving. It's Facebook today, it's Groupon tomorrow, and it will be someone else after that. Google Inc. still hasn't been able to develop an effective social networking tool to counter Facebook, a delay that could cost the company dearly as Facebook learns more about people's ages, hometowns and passions.
